name: Suicide Rabbits
description:
This is my first participation in a Ludum, and I've made the game with Stencyl.
I hope you enjoy the game and give me a feedback!

The purpose of the game is to reach the red button on the other side of the map, but it will not be easy. The deaths of your fellow rabbits, however, will be useful! Who will succeed in reaching the goal?

Controls:

  • WASD or arrows to Move
  • Spacebar or Z to Jump
  •  ESC to return to the title screen

UPDATE 1.1:

  • All collisions have been revisited, for a better and less unfair feeling of play
  •  Added an Easy Mode
  • The mine explosion area has been added (in Easy Mode is persistent)
  •  Added a dynamic overlapping to some graphic elements
  • Redesigned the symbols on the signs, for greater comprehensibility
  • Added new patterns in the Original Mode, for those looking for a more difficult challenge
  • The spikes have been redesigned
  • Some bug fixes

UPDATE 1.2:

  • Collisions bug fixed

Credits:

  • Tool used to develop: Stencyl
  • Game Soundtrack: My love (piano loop) by ShadyDave
  • Gameover Music: huh_nes by levelplane

A little hint:

"some obstacles may have different positions when you start a new game"

Have fun,
m3rcurial92!
